question: An e-office application called 'e-karyalay' has been launched by which Central Armed Police Force, which enables digital movement of files in offices, amid Covid-19 pandemic?
explanation:
An e-office application called 'e-karyalay' has been launched by Central Industrial Security Force (CISF) to prevent coronavirus infection.
The e-office application enables digital movement of files in offices, which is similar to the physical and traditional file movement in CISF offices. The application has been developed by the in-house technical team and they have also created the data recovery site.
